title: WiFi 6 Explained and Tested -  802.11ax is FAST!
description: The new WiFi 6 802.11ax wireless networks are finally here!  Let's explain what Wi-Fi 6 is, 802.11ax speeds, how to set up a wireless network and how far its range really is in some coverage areas.  Is this really the best wireless in 2020?    Buy items in this video from B&H & Amazon at the links below:  ASUS XT8 Mesh Black -    ASUS XT8 Mesh White -   ASUS WiFi 6 Add In Card -    ASUS RoG WiFi 6 -   ASUS RT-AX88U -   ASUS Zenbook 14 -    Subscribe    Review unit (and notebook) provided free of charge & due to the value of those items, this video is partially sponsored by ASUS.  As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera (Dmitry) -  Main Lens (Dmitry) -  Main Camera (Eber) -  Main Lens (Eber) -  Main 2nd Lens (Eber) -  Main Camera Mic (D & E) -  Cheap 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Awesome Slider -  Our Shotgun Mic -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #wifi6 #802.11ax #asuszenwifi6 #hardwarecanucks #bestwifirouter2020
